Thank you Mitar for the below clarification.

Thank you

To: Furqan Akhai <Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com <mailto:Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com> >; Waqas Ahmad <Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com <mailto:Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com> >; Mariel Yard <Mariel.Yard@chalhoub.com <mailto:Mariel.Yard@chalhoub.com> >

Subject: RE: TAWREED, SILZ, Riyadh KSA - Solar Panels Agreement (PPA) 

 

Thank you,

 

Dear @Waqas Ahmad <mailto:Waqas.Ahmad@chalhoub.com> , please note there are no fixed charges in addition to variable monthly payment, which are based on the monthly energy production. Only the tariff is fixed.

 

Dear @Furqan Akhai <mailto:Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com> , direct debt will not be required – vendor is aligned. Kindly propose rewording of the clause to suit our Group’s policies. 

 

Best Regards,

Mitar

 

mitar jokanovic​​​​

Hi Mitar,

 

On the below clause @Furqan Akhai <mailto:Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com>  to confirm:

 

All invoices shall become payable by the Customer within thirty (30) days from the date of the invoice by the Lessor.  All payments shall be paid by direct debit into the Lessor’s designated account by filling out the form in Annex 5.

chunks.text:
All invoices shall become payable by the Customer within thirty (30) days from the date of the invoice by the Lessor.  All payments shall be paid by direct debit into the Lessor’s designated account by filling out the form in Annex 5.

 

From the agreement I can see there will be a monthly variable lease payment depending on actual generation of electricity. Can you please confirm there is no fixed charge/ base rent per month/year in addition to variable lease payment?

 

@Furqan Akhai <mailto:Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com>  if all payments are variable then we will not need to capitalise this lease under IFRS and can book the expenses directly to PnL on straight line method.

 

Kind regards

Waqas

 

 

WAQAS AHMAD​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ REPORTING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 816 8000
